Record.ClassificationPath: Musculoskeletal Diseases/Bone Diseases/Bone Cysts/Bone Cysts, Aneurysmal
Record.Description: Solitary lesions of bone that typically cause a bulging of the overlying cortex bearing some resemblance to the saccular protrusion of the aortic wall in aortic aneurysm, hence the name. (Dorland, 27th ed)
